main.name: Rahul Meghani
main.description: Currently looking for the full time opportunities in the Software Engineering Industry
main.bio: Hi there! I am Rahul. Results-driven Software Engineer with 2.5 years of experience in full-stack development, project management, and implementing eCommerce and SaaS web-based applications. Proficient in Java, Python and NodeJS with a track record of delivering user-centered websites that scale. Strong background in agile development and cross-functional team collaboration.

education.description: Graduated with First Class Honours. Relevant Coursework: Object Oriented Programming, Data Structures, Operating System, Software Engineering
Graduated with First Class Honours. Relevant Coursework: Advanced Computing Concepts, Advanced Software Engineering topics, Distributed Databases

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description:
• Implemented an automation solution for account consolidation across GitHub, Jenkins, Bitbucket, and LDAP, resulting in enhanced system efficiency and streamlined user account management. 
 
 • Spearheaded the migration of an on-premises database to Azure cloud using Flyway and Azure Jump box, ensuring data security, seamless backups, and high availability for the Onboarding project. 
 
 • Contributed to the development and improvement of an internal KPI website using Django and REST API, enhancing the platform's usability and value for data-driven decision-making.

work.title: Software Designer
work.description:
• Managed end-to-end software lifecycle for multiple projects, consistently achieving high client satisfaction and timely delivery across North America. 
 
 • Collaborated with backend developers to create dynamic web pages using JavaScript and Django framework, resulting in a 15% increase in website leads.
 
 • Developed and implemented React JS, Redux, and Node JS surveys for Medallia (SaaS) clients, effectively capturing user responses for comprehensive business analysis in the Medallia Experience Cloud. 
 
 • Ensured product quality through rigorous testing, code reviews, and team collaboration, identifying and addressing issues during the development process. 
 
 • Leveraged Scrum methodology and JIRA to optimize software workflow management, increasing task success rate by 25%.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description:
• Delivered high-quality results on time and within budget by actively participating in the complete software development process for multiple projects.
 
 • Designed and developed responsive, accessible, and high-performance UIs using ReactJS, Redux & GraphQL for over five projects, earning positive feedback from clients. 
 
 • Enhanced user experience by implementing web services with J2EE using Spring MVC, Spring IOC, Spring Transactions, Spring security modules, and REST APIs, increasing average user time on page by 2 minutes. 
 
 •  Developed and integrated microservices for inventory, scheduling, billing, currency exchange, and content management, significantly boosting online sales for a major Indian clothing brand.

projects.title: Metaverse Web3.0 chat app (React JS & Moralis)

testimonials.text: Rahul is a pleasure to work with! He takes initiative, troubleshoots with an open mind and determination, and has become a true Medallia software implementer and guru. I highly recommend Rahul to any team, with no hesitation. I can’t wait to see what he does next!
